info.title: Zako3 HQ API
info.description: RESTful API for Zako3 platform - manage users, communities (taps), and bot settings

bearerAuth.description: JWT token obtained from authentication provider

get.description: Returns OK if the service is running
Kubernetes liveness probe - returns OK if the service is alive
Kubernetes readiness probe - checks if all dependencies are healthy
Retrieves the resolved value for a setting key, considering scope cascading.

put.description: Sets a value for a setting key at the specified scope.

scopeType.description: The scope type to set the value at

delete.description: Removes a setting value at the specified scope, reverting to the next level in the cascade.

parameters.name: scopeType
parameters.description: The scope type to delete from

get.description: Lists all settings for the specified kind and optional scope filter. Only accessible by admins or the resource owner.

parameters.name: settingsKind
parameters.description: The kind of settings to list

isDefault.description: Whether this is the default value

get.description: Get the authenticated user's full profile including private information
Get a public user profile by user ID
Get a paginated list of taps with optional filtering

id.description: Tap ID (slug, lowercase alphanumeric with hyphens)

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific tap

patch.description: Update tap properties (owner or admin only)
